verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: plans] [ARG1: a Nashville rally] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-LOC: at downtown 's Municipal Auditorium] , [ARGM-ADV: making his first visit to Tennessee as president just weeks after entering the White House] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] plans a Nashville rally on Wednesday at downtown 's Municipal Auditorium , [V: making] [ARG1: his first visit to Tennessee as president] [ARGM-TMP: just weeks after entering the White House] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] plans a Nashville rally on Wednesday at downtown 's Municipal Auditorium , making his first visit to Tennessee as president just weeks after [V: entering] [ARG1: the White House] .
